comment.author: 72347661@N02
comment._content:
I Think (mind you think) this is a former British Sopwith Camel which was supplied to the US AEF in 1918.
There is a former ID on the fin/rudder which I cannot read. There is one other known serial/code by a Camel in France (1684) which is in the same range as this one, 1611. 
Stig
